remarks: Closure of the projective subspace closure function.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pclfval.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pclfval.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pclfval.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
pclclN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ X C_ A ) -> ( U ` X ) e. S ) $.
